role_description: An Ansible role that installs gitstats (a local git statistics terminal charting app) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [gitstats](https://github.com/IonicaBizau/git-stats) can track and display local git statistics. It includes the capability of displaying a GitHub-like contributions calendar in the terminal.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs gitstats (a local git statistics terminal charting app) on nearly any platform.
